text:
nAntarE#tiq tadaqgnirdEqvO dEqvEByOq vana#tE vaqyamaqgnErmAnu#ShAq ityA#hAqgnirdEqvEByO# vanuqtE vaqyaM ma#nuqShyE$Byaq itiq vAvaitadA#hEqha gati#rvAqmasyEqdaM caq namO# dEqvEByaq ityA#haq yAScaiqva dEqvatAq yaja#tiq yAScaq na tABya# EqvOBayI$ByOq nama#skarOtyAqtmanO&nA$rtyai || 56
(SriqtaH - tEq pra - triqShTuBa# - mEqtad - dyAvA#pRuthiqvI - yA ayA$kShma- prAqNAnEqva - ShaTca#tvAri(gm)Sacca )(A9)
